2024-05-02.name: Hui Ming: Fenghuo San Yue
2024-05-02.desc:
High school student Zheng Shaopeng fell asleep in a history class. When he woke up, he found that he had arrived at the Danzhu Dynasty in the history book and transformed into the poor scholar Yang Lin. At first, Yang Lin could not adapt to ancient life, but as he used modern thinking to develop some small inventions, Yang Lin became popular and loved by the villagers, and he gradually found his own sense of belonging. In an era of internal and external troubles, Yang Lin experienced wars and witnessed the sufferings of the people. He relied on his wisdom and ability to win a place in the court, and gradually led the Danzhu Dynasty to curb corrupt officials internally and defend against powerful enemies externally. With scientific and technological progress, The road to a powerful nation by breaking through superstition.

source: bgm.tv/googletranslate

2024-05-02.name: Time Patrol Bon
2024-05-02.desc:
* Based on a manga series written and illustrated by the duo Fujiko Fujio, in celebration of Fujiko F. Fujio posthumous 90th anniversary.

An ordinary high school student named Bon becomes part of a team of time-traveling agents tasked with saving people's lives during historical events that happen across different eras and locations around the globe.

Source: Netflix

2024-05-04.name: Boku no Hero Academia (2024)
2024-05-04.desc: * Based on a super hero manga series written and illustrated by Horikoshi Kouhei.

2024-05-10.name: Code Geass: Dakkan no Roze
2024-05-10.desc:
Year Seven of the Kowa Period, in the former Hokkaido Block occupied by the Neo-Britannian Empire, live mercenary brothers known as the Nameless Mercenaries. The eldest, Ash, has excellent athletic ability and advanced Knightmare Frame controlling skills, while the youngest, Rozé, is clearheaded and oversees intel gathering and devising strategies. Due to an impregnable wall of energy called the Situmpe Wall, for four years the 100th emperor who stopped the Black Knights' liberation plan, Callis al Britannia, has been trying to plunge the world into chaos once again with the help of his servant, Norland, and his Einberg Knights. Upon receiving a request, Rozé and Ash, along with the Seven Shining Stars resistance group confront the Empire to recapture Princess Sakuya.

Source: Disney+

Note: It received an advance screening in theatres in four parts with episodes 1-3 having aired on May 10, 2024, episodes 4-6 on June 7, 2024, episodes 7-9 on July 5, 2024, and episodes 10-12 on August 2, 2024. The regular broadcast started on June 21, 2024.

2024-05-10.name: Harinezumi no Ruchika
2024-05-10.desc: A long-loved picture book that can be enjoyed by children and adults of all ages has been made into an animation.

2024-05-12.name: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Hashira Geiko Hen
2024-05-12.desc:
* Based on an action fantasy shounen manga by Gotouge Koyoharu.

Note: The first episode received an early screening in cinemas worldwide starting on Febuary 2, 2024 at TOHO Cinemas Hibiya in Tokyo. The regular TV broadcast started on May 12, 2024.

2024-05-17.name: Fengyun Bian
2024-05-17.desc:
"The Storm" tells the story of top warriors Bu Jingyun and Nie Feng. In order to cope with a catastrophe that was about to sweep the entire world, they transformed into quantum states with the help of unknown seniors and mysterious extraterrestrial visitors, and their whereabouts are unknown. Three thousand years later, an asteroid hit the earth, turning the surface into a barbaric wasteland. Human beings trapped underground gradually discovered that there is a super power known as "pulse energy" in the human body. Bu Tianyun, an orphan from Dungeon 32, accidentally awakened Bu Jingyun who was sleeping in the meteorite. From then on, he discovered the "pulse energy" potential in his body, and together with Nie Feng's successor Nie Zifeng, embarked on the journey to become " The journey of training as a "pulse warrior", fighting to protect the world.

source: bgm.tv/googletranslate

2024-05-18.name: Jinwu Wei: Feng Qi Jinling
2024-05-18.desc:
Qin Ming, who is good at mecha tricks, was pulled by Bai Qi, who is good at solving puzzles, to be a Jinwu Guard and a firefighter of the Pihuo Division. In the Leihuo case, he met Jing Yifei, the "first sister" of the Bingmasi Division. The three of them formed a detective team. They not only had to clear the layers of fog, but also understood their own life experiences, as well as the responsibilities and significance of being a Jinwu Guard.

source: bgm.tv/deepl

2024-05-23.name: Garouden: The Way of the Lone Wolf
2024-05-23.desc:
On the run from his troubled past, Juuzou is forced into competing in a deadly underground fighting tournament. Skilled in the respected martial art Takemiya-ryu, Juuzou must navigate a path filled with formidable foes and his personal demons — all while dealing with a bounty of three million yen on his head and a detective on his trail.

Source: Netflix

2024-05-23.name: Xiehou Ta de Shaonu Shidai
2024-05-23.desc:
In order to save his terminally ill mother, the unfilial son Dong Cuican signed a "contract" with a mysterious man, exchanging his own time for his dying mother. After recovery, his mother Yan Jinyu not only returned to her healthy state at the age of 20, but also relied on her maturity and optimism that surpassed her "peers" to live a more wonderful life that she had never dared to imagine. However, on the other hand, in order not to worry his mother, Dong Cuican concealed the truth about his life and shouldered the cost of the contract alone. And decided to make up for his past regrets and repay his mother's kindness in the last time of his life...

source: bgm.tv/googletranslate

2024-05-24.name: Dead Dead Demon`s Dededededestruction (Web)
2024-05-24.desc:
The Japan Self-Defense Forces are still looking for a way to combat the alien threat, but so far conventional weapons have had no effect. Maybe it’s time to try something unconventional.

Meanwhile, Koyama Kadode and her best friend avidly track the aliens’ movements on social media and less enthusiastically study for college entrance exams. When the end of the world looms overhead, you learn to take things one step at a time.

Source: Viz Media

Note: The Dead Dead Demon's Dededede Destruction movies were rebroadcast as an 18 episode web series, with new content added. This rebroadcast first aired on Crunchyroll.

2024-05-24.name: Uma Musume: Pretty Derby - Shinjidai no Tobira

2024-05-26.name: Huan Chong Shi
2024-05-26.desc:
Birds soaring in the blue sky and green grass; bloody wolves wild and unruly in the desert. Night dream beasts flying in the moonlight jungle, Chaos Thunder Crown Elves, Ice Curse Seal Demon Fox... Plants, monsters, elements, undead, this is a bizarre, mysterious and brilliant soul pet world! Chu Mu, a young soul pet trainer, revenge? Competition? At first, the boy and the spirit fox were just struggling in a world where the strong prey on the weak. However, fate forced them to move towards the peak, meet partners, crush conspiracies, break curses, stand in front of their enemies and swing their claws. Everything started from the hand that Chu Mu stretched out. He said, let's call you Moye.

source: bgm.tv/deepl

2024-05-30.name: Yuan Zun
2024-05-30.desc:
Adapted from the novel of the same name by Tian Can Tu Dou, this is a world of source energy, called Tian Yuan Realm, which is magnificent and grand, and the source energy can move mountains, overturn the sea, turn the world upside down, and control the yin and yang of the universe. Zhou Yuan, a young man from the Great Zhou Dynasty, was threatened by the enemy country with hundreds of millions of people, "the python swallowed the dragon, and took away the "holy dragon luck" that originally belonged to him. As a result, Zhou Yuan has been entangled in poison and tortured for more than ten years. The young Zhou Yuan entered the ancestral land and met the mysterious girl Tian Tian, who freed himself from the shackles of his own strength and bravely saved his country. The young man wrote, and the dragons and snakes danced! Split the troubled times and light up the sky! I have a breath of Xuanhuang Qi that can swallow the world, the sun, the moon and the stars. In this world of source energy, Zhou Yuan, a young man with no obvious eight meridians, began his fate hanging in the air and reversing his life on the road of nirvana...

source: movie.douban.com/googletranslate
